text.value: Have you educated the caregiver on the above information?
Press the timer and count number of breaths for a full 60 seconds two times. Fast breathing is when you count 60 breaths or more twice. (Use a watch or timer)
Educate and Refer to the health facility.
Encourage the caregiver to continue adhering to the immunization schedule.
**Refer the child immediately to the health facility.**
Use your thermometer to take the patient's temperature. Ensure you clean the thermometer with surgical spirit in cotton wool before and after use.
Fast breathing: Two counts of 60 breaths or more in one minute (Use a watch or timer)
Have a fever of 38 and above or hotness of the body?
Infected umbilicus red or draining pus, skin boils, or eyes draining pus
Not able to feed since birth, or stopped feeding well
Only moves when stimulated, or does not move even on stimulation.
None cannot be selected with any other option!
Ask for the following danger signs of newborn
**If relocated remember to submit a muting request, if they died remember to submit a death report.**
Have you referred to the health facility?
Fast breathing: Two counts of 60 breaths or more in one minute (Use a watch or timer)
Have a fever of 38 and above or hotness of the body?
A Referral Follow up task will appear after 1 day
Infected umbilicus red or draining pus, skin boils, or eyes draining pus
is not available for follow up.
Not able to feed since birth, or stopped feeding well
Only moves when stimulated, or does not move even on stimulation.
Educate caregiver and refer to the health facilty for newborn danger signs
Educate caregiver and refer to the health facilty for immunization visit
A Referral Follow up task will appear after 3 days
Please sync after submitting this form for the health facility to receive this referral information
Be sure you Submit to complete this action.
Congratulate and encourage them to continue updating their insurance cover
Encourage to get an insurance cover if they don't have or to update their insurance cover

bind.calculate: concat( concat( /postnatal_care_service_newborn/patient_age_in_years , if( /postnatal_care_service_newborn/patient_age_in_years =1,' year and ',' years and ')), concat( /postnatal_care_service_newborn/patient_age_in_months mod 12, if(( /postnatal_care_service_newborn/patient_age_in_months mod 12)=1,' month old',' months old')) )
if( /postnatal_care_service_newborn/insurance/has_upto_date_insurance = 'yes', 'Insurance upto date', 'Insurance not upto date')
